=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Construction of an Aircraft Hangar in Iqaluit, Nunavut**

**Reference Number: WS3825000203-Doc3831508152**
**Publication Date: 2023-03-02**
**Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-25 14:00:00**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting on behalf of the Department of Transport (TC) is seeking proposals for the construction of an aircraft hangar in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The project is part of the National Aerial Surveillance Program (NASP) aimed at providing a fixed surveillance aircraft facility for the Prairie and Northern region.

**Project Overview**

The new aircraft hangar will cover an area of over 2,500 m² and will accommodate fixed surveillance aircraft storage and maintenance, grounds operations, and offices. The project is subject to the Agreement Between the Inuit of the Nunavut Settlement Area and His Majesty the King in Right of Canada (Nunavut Directive).

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Important Notice**

**UPDATE** - The closing time for bid submission has been modified to April 25, 2023, at 14:00:00. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by this time. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Hector Ho (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
